meanings.definition: A device used for aiming a firearm at a distant target, typically equipped with a telescopic sight.
meanings.sent1: The sniperscope helped the soldier see faraway targets clearly.
meanings.sent2: The sniper adjusted the sniperscope to focus on the distant building.
meanings.sent3: When the sniperscope winked at me, I knew it was time to practice shooting.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a sniperscope, always focused on her goals.
meanings.sent5: Through the sniperscope, the world seemed closer and more precise.

meanings.definition: To equip with a sniperscope for improved accuracy in shooting.
meanings.sent1: He decided to sniperscope his rifle before the competition.
meanings.sent2: The expert marksman sniperscoped his weapon before the mission.
meanings.sent3: I sniperscope my toy gun to make sure I hit all the targets in the game.
meanings.sent4: She sniperscoped her camera to capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent5: The archer sniperscoped his bow, ready to hit the bullseye.
